title: Title
text: Thee findeth the h'ro a did bite annoying, suspecting th're is m're to this st'ry then meets the eye, facing a cubiculo with 3 ways of proceeding thou art somewhat getting
excit'd.  is this thy fighting spirit yond tingles from the humour bef're a valorous square? 'r p'rhaps the exp'rience in challenges 'r expl'ration?

buttons.text: The hero sees a brink of light, he follows it.(its just a firefly)
The hero fights the squire as you are useless, so you prented that you got offended and run to other direction
You say to your party that you forgot to pee, so you go back to the tent to take out your pee bucket.
The squire tries to stop you, the hero intervens and falls to room 11, you follow him while doing a PalmFace.
